code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from"redux";import logger from"redux-logger";import createSagaMiddleware from"redux-saga";import rootSaga from"./root-saga";import rootReducer from"./root-reducer";import{composeWithDevTools}from"redux-devtools-extension";var sagaMiddleware=createSagaMiddleware();var middlewares=[sagaMiddleware];if(process.env.NODE_ENV==="development"){middlewares.push(logger);}var store=createStore(rootReducer,composeWithDevTools(applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middlewares)));sagaMiddleware.run(rootSaga);export default store;
